blocks.title: Privacy Policy
blocks.subtitle: Data & Cookies
blocks.text:
Webdevamin ('we', 'us', 'our') operates the website https://webdevamin.com. This privacy policy describes how we handle personal data when you use our website.

1. Data Controller

The data controller for your data is Webdevamin, which can be reached via amin@webdevamin.com.

2. Data Collection and Use

We do not collect personal data directly, but we use the following services that may collect data:

  • PostHog: for web analytics, session replay, and error tracking
  • Cloudflare: for hosting and security
  • Resend: for email communication

These services may collect different types of data according to their own privacy policies.

3. Legal Basis for Processing

We process data based on:

  • Consent: Through our cookie banner, you can explicitly consent to the use of analytical and tracking cookies.
  • Legitimate Interest: For understanding our audience and improving our services.

4. Data Transfer

Some data is processed outside the European Economic Area (EEA), for example by PostHog. This transfer is protected by appropriate safeguards, including Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC).

5. Retention Period

Data collected via PostHog is managed according to their data retention policies. Aggregated, anonymized data may be retained indefinitely for analytical purposes.

6. Security

We implement the following security measures:

  • Data encryption via HTTPS/TLS
  • IP anonymization where applicable
  • Limited access controls
  • Regular security updates
  • Firewall and malware protection

7. Your Rights

Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:

  • Right to information about the processing of your data
  • Right to access your data
  • Right to rectification of incorrect data
  • Right to erasure ('right to be forgotten')
  • Right to restriction of processing
  • Right to data portability
  • Right to object to processing
  • Right not to be subject to automated decision-making

For questions about your rights, you can contact us via amin@webdevamin.com.

8. Cookies

We use cookies for:

  • Analytical purposes (PostHog)
  • Session recording and error tracking (PostHog)

You can manage your cookie preferences through our cookie banner or your browser settings.

9. Google Ads & Consent (Consent Mode v2)

We use Google Ads and the Google Consent Mode v2 to respect user choices under the GDPR while maintaining measurement quality. Consent Mode adjusts how Google tags behave based on your consent selection for categories such as ad_storage, analytics_storage, ad_user_data and ad_personalization.

When is Google Ads active?

Google Ads may be enabled or temporarily disabled depending on our business needs and compliance requirements. This means advertising cookies and related processing are not always active. If disabled, Google Ads tags will not run or will operate in a limited, consentless mode that does not use personal data.

Consent and regions (EEA)

For visitors in the European Economic Area (EEA), our default is to deny advertising and analytics until you give consent via our cookie banner. Outside the EEA, defaults may be set to granted. Your choice is stored and can be changed at any time.

Legal bases

We rely on consent for advertising and analytics cookies. For basic site operation and security, we rely on legitimate interests.

What data may be processed?

Depending on your consent, Google may process data such as cookie identifiers, IP-based location, device/browser information, and interaction events. In consentless or denied mode, Google uses modeling and non-identifying signals where possible.

International transfers

Data processed by Google may be transferred outside the EEA with safeguards (e.g., Standard Contractual Clauses). See Google’s privacy policy for details.

Managing your choices

You can accept or decline via our cookie banner. You can also revisit and change your choice by clearing cookies or using your browser’s settings. If you withdraw consent, we will stop using the relevant cookies and ensure Google tags respect your updated choice.

10. Changes to this Privacy Policy

We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy. Changes will be published on this page.

11. Contact

For questions about this privacy policy or your data, you can contact us via amin@webdevamin.com.

Last updated: 13 November 2025
